instanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for Validators and Rpc (t2.micro, t2.large)

joystreamAmi.description: Pre-built AMI ID - leave blank to build from source

networkName.description: Chain network name displayed in telemetry

networkId.description: Id used as chain-id and protocol-id in chainsepc config

initialBalancesFile.description: HTTP Link to the Initial Balances file

runtimeProfile.description: STAGING | PLAYGROUND | TESTING - leave empty for production
